trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumnReorderingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumnReorderingEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The column that is being moved.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the reordering operation is stopped before completion.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出重新排列作業是否完成前停止。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reordering operation is stopped before completion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果重新排列作業停止之前完成。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control that is used to display the visual indicator of the header for the column that is being dragged.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示要拖曳的資料行的標頭的視覺指示器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The control that is used to display a dragged column header.
trans-unit.target: 控制項所顯示的拖曳的資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control that is used to display the visual indicator of the current drop location during a column drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示目前的置放位置的視覺指標資料行拖曳作業期間控制。

trans-unit.source: The control that is used to display the drop location indicator during a column drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示期間資料行的置放位置指示器控制項拖曳作業。
